title: Guiding Questions: Product Stewardship and Consumer Education

firstquestion.title: How long is this product designed to be used for?
firstquestion.description: For example, LEGO blocks are designed for a long use phase, even multi-generational: Blocks made today fit those made more than 50 years ago.

secondquestion.title: What tradeoffs have become apparent to you?
